Text: Thanks so much! I hadn't even heard of this series--my mom will love it!!! (Me too:) Cheers!

Excellent!

Here are some corrected captions for 'Sherlock Holmes - S01E05 - The Crooked Man.srt' :

I wanted to take the time to thank you properly and formally for these. I teach at a tiny school with horribly limited resources, and the students have shown great interest in the writings of Arthur Conan Doyleâ€™s Sherlock Holmes. It has been an inestimable treat for them to watch many of these faithful recreations of the classic stories. By making these available, I can attest that you have brought joy (and perhaps some actual love of literature) to some deprived young minds. You are to be commended. Thank you!
